div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in Fetal Presentations
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 15028002 (Abnormal fetal presentation)

description.value: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. It expands on the [FetalPresentationsVS] by including intensionally all codes for abnormal presentations, as suggested by [FHIR-44554](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-44554).

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
